name: new FPS Demo
description:
new Fps is not really a new concept its just an fps. but whats makes it different is the style the game is made in. the game is also simple to play and is fun. if you hit something with your gun the blue smoke is amazing to see. and if you get hit the red smoke will let you think fast. because this game has 5 classes(assault, heavy, officer, death gunner and spy) you need to know wich one is the best for the map.

of course the enemy's also have all those classes so getting killed by a spy or assault will happen. this is the reason you need to look out for the enemy's on the field. because their main target is you.

the game has 2 game modes Deathmatch and survival. in deathmatch you fight with your team against the other team. and in survival your goal is to survive 25 waves of enemy's. both modes are not easy because of the AI of the enemy.

if you like or found a bug the game please comment it. i spend a lot of time working on this fps so i would like to know.

this is only the demo of the game!
